title: Medical Martial God - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Doctors   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Modern Day   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation
author: Xiao Ming   潇铭
description: The unparalleled Demon King Ye Xuan, who was able to heal the dead or the living alike and holder of the medicine Holy Scripture, was betrayed and killed by his fellow Demon Kings. But he reincarnated into the body of Ye Xuan, the prodigal son of the Ye family and vowed to himself that he would return to his peak and take back everything that belonged to him!>
